option.swextra.enable_rich_presence.tool: Whether or not a rich presence should be displayed on your Discord client
option.swextra.rich_presence_display_tim: Display the time you've been on Smash Wizards for in your Discord rich presence
option.swextra.rich_presence_display_ser: Display the server you're currently connected to in your Discord rich presence
option.swextra.remove_loading_terrain_de: Remove the built-in 2 seconds loading screen delay when loading new terrain

Remove the loading terrain delay everywhere (on every server & world).
The 'Remove Loading Terrain Delay' option must be true for this to work
